articles.title: Oppo launches A54 5G with Snapdragon 480, 90Hz display and 5000mAh battery - India Today
articles.description: Oppo has launched the Oppo A54 5G in Europe. It ships with Snapdragon 480 SoC, 90Hz display and 5000mAh battery. The sole 4GB/64GB variant of the Oppo A54 5G is available for EUR 219.
articles.content: Oppo has launched its new midrange 5G device in Europe. This smartphone called the Oppo A54 5G succeeds over the Oppo A53 that launched back in August last year. It brings in Qualcomm's Snapdragon 48… [+1801 chars]

articles.author: CNA
articles.title: Football: Guardiola exorcises Champions League demons to lead Man City to first final - CNA
articles.description: After a decade of disappointment, Pep Guardiola is back in a Champions League final and just one game away from delivering on his task to make Manchester City champions of Europe for the first time.
articles.content: MANCHESTER: After a decade of disappointment, Pep Guardiola is back in a Champions League final and just one game away from delivering on his task to make Manchester City champions of Europe for the … [+3637 chars]
